name: Python For beginners
info: This course is designed to teach you how to program using Python.

name: Visualize Data With Python
info: Master the main data analysis and visualization libraries in Python:

name: Build a backend rest API
info: Create an advanced REST API with Python, Django REST Framework and Docker using Test Driven Development (TDD).

name: Python for Data Science
info: Use Python for Data Science and Machine Learning.

name: Build a Machine Learning Model With Python
info: Includes Python 3, scikit-learn, matplotlib, pandas, Jupyter Notebooks, and more.

name: Learn Intermediate Python 3
info: If you’re looking for a programming language that’s flexible and easy to read, try learning Python!
